Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Ann Martin
Reviews.Content: The features are excellent!!!  I have mobile access from both service providers and can access BBM, Whatsapp and a host of other network applications!!

Reviews.Title: Works in Venezuela (Movistar)
Reviews.Author: Miriam Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this phone, works well in my country Venezuela, I love the size, the color and I think it's great for the price
